title: Mini-Ep 230: Performance (F)art
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 230: Performance (F)art
itunes:subtitle: Kate goes for a six-mile hike in the great Los Angeles outdoors and Doree has a guest-inspired epiphany about how to prioritize saying no. Then, listeners call in with all kinds of bodily questions from ears to butts, asking how to tell friends and fam...
description:
Kate goes for a six-mile hike in the great Los Angeles outdoors and Doree has a guest-inspired epiphany about how to prioritize saying no. Then, listeners call in with all kinds of bodily questions from ears to butts, asking how to tell friends and family about going through a hard time, and wondering where all the Kiwi listeners are at. 


  • To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach them at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.
  • Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything they mention on the show.
  • Follow the podcast on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums). 
  • Sign up for the newsletter! At forever35podcast.com/newsletter
